It interacts with the Neo PLM Global // Integration Service, for the purpose of: // 1) Determining if the combination of Source System ID, Plant ID and Material ID Maps to a Neo PLM Consumable. // 2) Enhancing the incoming message with the Neo PLM Consumable UID context, if available for use in downstream processing. // This process with accept an XML message in the form of // <FacilityLookup> // <SourceSystemID>Europe2</SourceSystemID> // <PlantID>BEP7</PlantID> // </FacilityLookup> // It will return an XML message in the form of // <Facility> // <UID>12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012</UID> // </Facility> // In the event of a messaging failure between Neuron ESB and Neo PLM Global Integration service, an exception will be generated by this // Sub Process. It will be assumed that this type of exception will be handled by the parent (calling) process. context.Instance.TraceInformation (" *****************************************");
